A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I give this 2 stars because it is a Star Wars Movie. They have completely destroyed the lore they built in the force awakens and have made this movie a mess! Awful stuff! The sub plot was awful and the resistance yo remove a character like Leia was terrible. Does she have force powers now? No! They made Rey way to strong with 0 training. I am scared for all future Star Wars films as this was very disappointing. Waited 2 years for nothing but more unanswered questions. Don’t even get me started on killing off Snoke who (we thought) was the main villain. Awful!
